Action.author: burdettadam
Action.body: }}) * show a connection / connection request ({{show connection }}) * accept a connection request ({{accept request from }}) * check secure agent-to-agent communication channel ({{ping }}) * show a claim from the wallet or available from a remote agent ({{show claim }}) * obtain a claim from a remote agent ({{request claim }}) * show a proof request ({{show proof request }}) * send a proof to a remote agent ({{send proof to }}) Most of these commands require the implementation of agent-to-agent communication, which is implemented in {{indy-node/indy_client}} (reusing some code from {{indy-plenum}}), but not in {{libindy}}.| >
